description: Kuki ari ngombwa kuganira no kungurana ibitekerezo ku kuboneza urubyaro?
title: Kuki ari ngombwa kuganira no kungurana ibitekerezo ku kuboneza urubyaro?
content:
Imbyaro nyinshi, kubyara indahekana, kubyara mbere y’imyaka 18 cyangwa urengeje imyaka 35 bigira ingaruka mbi n’ibibazo ku babyeyi n’abana babyara.
Kuboneza urubyaro ni uburyo bwiza bwo kubungabunga ubuzima bw’umubyeyi n’umwana. Serivisi zite mu nshingano kuboneza urubyaro zitanga ubumenyi ku bagabo n’abagore ndetse n’urubyiruko rubyifuza ku buryo bwo kuboneza urubyaro, guhitamo no guteganya umubare w’abana bazabyara. Nyamara nubwo izo serivisi zihari, abagore benshi ndetse n’urubyiruko ntibaramenya kwirinda no kwifatira icyemezo cyo gusama batabiteganije, kubyara indahekana no gukuriki-ranya imbyaro neza.

Abagore n’abagabo bose bate uburenganzira bungana mu gufata ibyemezo ku kuboneza urubyaro, guhitamo no guteganya umubare w’abana bazabyara. Ubujy-anama bahabwa bubafasha gufata ibyezo byo kwirinda ingaruka zo kubyara indahekana. Ubumenyi buhagije ku miryango ku kuboneza urubyaro, no kwiga ku bana bose (abakobwa n’abahungu), bifasha kugabanya impfu z’ababyeyi n’abana. Ibi byose bishyizwe mu bikorwa n’imiryango byafasha mu kubahiriza uburengan-zira bw’umubyeyi n’umwana bwo kugira imibereho myiza.
